exceptions.exn: In environment factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b n : nat Unable to unify "1 = Π n (fun i : nat => i + 1)" with "fact n = mprod_an 1 n".
Found no subterm matching "?M1669 * 1" in the current goal.
In environment H0 : forall n : nat, n * 1 = n n0 : nat -> nat -> nat factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b n, H : nat Unable to unify "n0 1 n" with "fact n".

original: apply factorial_cancel with (a := 1) (b := mprod_an 1 n). rewrite mult_1_r. reflexivity.
